snippet.title: FEAR FA 98 - GDC 2025 Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description: FEAR FA 98 is a horror arcade soccer simulator single player and multiplayer that combines all the competitive elements of the soccer world with the horror aspects that made series like Silent Hill or Manhunt great. Play against the computer, or compete in sinister arcade  leagues with your friends! And don't forget the classic local mode to enjoy with your friends on a terrifying afternoon worthy of the '90s
